Package cpsc3720.contactserver

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AffiliationAndLocation  
    AIShipMoveParams
    AISHipMoveParams is used to collect data from the client in order pass to the server so the AIShip can execute and action.
    AlertLevelParams
    AlertLevelParams is used to collect data from the client in order pass to the server so the alert level cam be changed
    AssociationsParameter
    AlertLevelParams is used to collect data from the client in order pass to the server so the alert level cam be changed
    AttackData
    Attack Data holds the values of a ship that as been attacked uses these values for the attack log
    AttackLogObject
    Attack Log object stores a string to present in the attack log string
    Base
    Base represents an in game base.
    BaseTracker
    Tracks instances of base.
    Cell
    Represents a cell on the game board, holds a ship, base or is empty
    ContactServer
    Contact Server represents the server side functionality, and keeps track of separate game instances.
    Empire
    Empire represents and empire instance in the Game.
    EmpireTracker
    Tracks a Game's instances of Empire
    FindShipParams
    Collects the Data find a ship and pass that information between the client and server
    FireParams
    FireParams is used to collect data from the client in order to excecute fireTorpedo on the server.
    Game
    The Game class represents Game instances.
    GameInstanceData
    Holds the user and gameID of a game
    Location
    This class is used so that objects know where they are both in the sector and universe.
    MoveShipParams
    Collects the ship id, game Id and move target to pass to the server to moce a ship
    Pair
    Pair is a convenience object for sending and returning x,y coordinates.
    Player  
    PlayerTracker  
    RefreshParams
    RefreshParams is used to collect data from the client in order pass to the server so we can refresh the screen
    Sector
    Sector represents the set of Cells in a single sector of the universe model.
    Ship  
    ShipDamage
    records the damage level of a ship as well as if the ship is destroyed to set it up it be removed
    ShipTracker
    Ship Tracker keeps track of a list of all of the ship objects that are created after parsing the .dat file
    ShipType  
    ShipTypeTracker  
    TableLineItem
    Used for Join game table
    Universe
    Universe Holds game state information in a format for display
    User
    User Holds credentials for signing in
    UserTracker
    Keeps track of all the users that are registered
    Weapon
    A text field will be parsed in order to create objects of weapons each created weapon will pass it's information to the constructor and fill the fields
    WeaponTracker
    Weapon tracker keeps 2 lists the hold the weapon objects created when parsing a .dat file each map is used to access the weapon data in different ways
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AlertType
    Convenience ENUM for determining the alert level of a specific ship.
    TypeEnum
    used to store if an object is a ship, base, or nothing
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GameNotFoundException
    The game not found excpetion is thrown by functions which attempt to find a game.
    NoObjectInCell
    This exception is used to set the "No Ship Found In Cell" messages in MainGameFrame.
    ShipNotFoundException
